data.title: Countries mentioned in the Wikipedia page for Belize
data.meta_description: Try to name all of the countries mentioned in the Wikipedia page for Belize.
data.text:
Hint

Answer

It is bordered to the north by

Mexico

It is bordered to the west and south by

Guatemala

It also shares a water boundary with

Honduras

Claims were laid to the land by

Spain

Belize achieved its independence from the

United Kingdom

The United Kingdom formally declared it a British Crown Colony, subordinate to

Jamaica

The Caribbean Court of Justice, which currently serves as a final court of appeal for only

Barbados

The Caribbean Court of Justice, which currently serves as a final court of appeal for only

Guyana

The Caribbean Court of Justice, which currently serves as a final court of appeal for only

Saint Lucia

At various times, the issue has required mediation by the

United States

The area of the country totals 22,960 square kilometres, an area slightly larger than

El Salvador

The area of the country totals 22,960 square kilometres, an area slightly larger than

Israel

The second-largest barrier reef in the world, behind

Australia

As a part of the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor that stretches to

Panama

By contrast, protected land covers only 27% of

Costa Rica

Over the years they have also intermarried with Miskito from

Nicaragua

After the Treaty of Paris in 1763, when the British took over

Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

Around 4.8% of the population, being people and descendants from

Ireland

Around 4.8% of the population, being expats from

Canada

Other places in the Hindustani Belt in North

India

The 20th century saw the arrival of more Asian settlers from Mainland

China

The 20th century saw the arrival of more Asian settlers from

Syria

The 20th century saw the arrival of more Asian settlers from

Lebanon
